title: 65% w/r
body: I just find it odd that at 65% winrate diamond 4, no major loss streaks I only gain 15-16 LP while losing 20, you would think at a relatively positive winrate you would gain more than you lose, guess not lol

replies.body: riot just reduced gains and increased losses at diamond + because bad players could get master just by spamming (new season was like +25LP/-10LP in dia+)
what this tells u is that oce is a shit server, go try play in korea (Assuming you could ever get a friend to help u get an acc there) or na, enjoy the bots!
